src:
43歲長這樣？　蕭淑慎素顏曝光嚇傻余祥銓
01 Nov 2019, 07:05 by 張詠淇
中天綜合台36頻道《小明星大跟班》今（1日）晚10點將播出主題「女明星素顏調查局」，邀請女藝人蕭淑慎、薔薔、元元、林采緹、安苡愛、何嘉文一同「素顏」上節目，且邀請小鐘、余祥銓代表男藝人的眼光排行，哪位女藝人素顏前後差異最大？並隨機街訪民眾認不認得素顏女藝人誰是誰呢？曾是性感女神的蕭淑慎以鼻頭無粉刺黑頭、臉部肌膚零毛孔自稱。
今年43歲的「蕭淑慎」拿下面具公開素顏後，令現場驚呼「不可能！看起來只有20幾歲『超逆齡』！」余祥銓更是看傻眼結巴的說：「看起來只有20幾歲，以前只注意到蕭淑慎的胸型與身材最漂亮，沒想到素顏的五官和臉型竟也完美，超逆齡！」蕭淑慎則表示：「我素顏不會到醜，但現在在螢光幕前曝光度較低，跟以前相比，走在路上較少人認出我。」


43歲的「蕭淑慎」拿下面具公開素顏後，令現場驚呼不可能！看起來只有20幾歲超逆齡。（中天提供）

被預測素顏落差最大的女藝人「薔薔」則認為自己的鼻子最美，並表示：「很多人都以為我鼻子是假的，還問我去哪做，但老娘的鼻子是百分之百真的！」揭曉素顏後竟被小鐘調侃：「妳很適合去拿大字報」薔薔自信回應：「我沒有包袱，就算沒洗頭沒洗澡仍可以出門逛大街」憲哥開玩笑道：「妳是因為有『知名度不高』的優勢，沒人知道妳才敢這樣出門亂晃！」薔薔立刻反駁：「我素顏出門買滷味還被粉絲認出，對方還說『妳化成灰我都認得』」余祥銓更補一槍：「7年前相約逛夜市，薔薔素顏戴眼鏡赴約，當下以為是家裡的瑪麗亞！」，笑翻眾人。但憲哥給予薔薔肯定：「妳有走紅的條件！主動表現自己、個性直率有特色，演藝圈缺少妳這種神經病。」
而被預測素顏落差第二大的「蛇姬林采緹」，素顏的氣色竟依然紅潤，膚況也好到自帶光芒。余祥銓震驚大讚：「看不出來已經是一個孩子的媽，身材膚質都好得不像話！」更曝：「二姊余苑綺產後膚況跟妳一樣好，但身材就不一樣了」林采緹卻無奈表示曾素顏沒打扮出門卻被網友酸「素顏像大嬸」，導致出門都會戴帽子掩飾自己的身分。蕭淑慎鼓勵她：「對於新聞報導、酸民的內文都不要看，眼不見為淨，只看自己照片美不美就好！」
更新時間｜2019.11.01 07:03
text:
43 years old like this? Xiao Shu Shen Su Yan exposure scared Yu Xiangyu
01 Nov 2019, 07:05 by Zhang Yiqi
Zhongtian Comprehensive Channel 36 "Little Star Big Follower" will broadcast the theme "Female Star Su Yan Investigation Bureau" at 10:00 pm today, inviting female artists Xiao Shushen, Yan, Yuan Yuan, Lin Caiyi, An Zhenai, He Jiawen Together with the "Sui Yan" program, and invited Xiao Zhong, Yu Xiangyu to represent the male artist's eyes, which female artist has the biggest difference before and after? And the random street visitors do not recognize who the female artist is? Xiao Shushen, who used to be a sexy goddess, claims to have no acne blackheads on her nose and zero pores on her face.
The 43-year-old "Xiao Shushen" took the mask and made her face open, and made the scene exclaimed "Impossible! It seems that only 20 years old "super-age age"!" Yu Xiangyu said that he was stupid and said: "It seems only 20 At the age of, I only noticed that Xiao Shushen’s chest shape and body were the most beautiful. I didn’t expect that the facial features and face of Su Yan were perfect, super-aged!” Xiao Shushen said: “I’m not going to be ugly, but now in front of the fluorescent screen. The exposure is low, and fewer people recognize me when they are on the road than before."


After the 43-year-old "Xiao Shushen" took off the mask and made a public appearance, it was impossible to exclaim the scene! It seems that only 20 years old is super-aged. (provided by Zhongtian)

The female artist, who is predicted to have the biggest gap in the face, thinks her nose is the most beautiful and says: "Many people think that my nose is fake and ask me where to do it, but my mother's nose is 100% true!" After revealing Su Yan, he was ridiculed by Xiao Zhong: "I am very suitable to get a big-character poster." I confidently responded: "I don't have any burdens. Even if I don't wash my hair or take a shower, I can go out and go shopping." Xian Ge joked: "Hey, because of "The popularity is not high", no one knows that you dare to go out like this!" I immediately replied: "I went out to buy the lo-mei and was recognized by the fans. The other party also said, "I know all the smelting ash." Yu Xiangwei More shots: "Seven years ago, I went to the night market, and I went to the appointment with glasses. I thought it was Maria at home!" However, the constitutional brother gave affirmation: "There are conditions for popularization! Active expression of oneself, individuality is straightforward and distinctive, and the entertainment industry lacks this neuropathy."
The "Snake Jilin Picking", which is predicted to be the second largest drop in Su Yan, is still ruddy, and the skin condition is also good. Yu Xiangqi was shocked and praised: "I can't see that it is already a child's mother. The skin is not so good!" It is even more exposed: "The skin condition of Yuyuan Yuyuan is as good as that of sputum, but the body is different." However, he said that Zeng Suyan did not dress up and was criticized by the netizens, so he would wear a hat to cover up his identity. Xiao Shushen encouraged her: "Don't look at the news reports, the texts of the sour people, the eyes are not seen as net, just look at their own photos are not beautiful!"
Update time|2019.11.01 07:03
